channel.title: Color yell help
channel.description:
I need help makeing my yell with colors.
I know it's @blu@ and ect but it's not working help me on tv please

item.title: Color yell help
item.dc:creator: @microscape microscape
item.description:
@microscape wrote:

here

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) { String titles = ""; 
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@gre@[Moderator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@blu@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@gre@[Mod/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@blu@[Owner/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@blu@[Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@gre@[Mod/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@blu@[Owner/Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }</blockquote>

there is one way you can edit what either play has like a regular players has one color and so on
also you can take out the

if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) { titles = "@blu@[Owner/Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
and make the player rights what ever but this part
if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) { titles = "@blu@[Owner/Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
is the title such as
playername:[member] message

your welcome =p any other questions add me on msn: mtv5858@live.com or reply

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) { String titles = ""; 
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@gre@[Moderator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@blu@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@gre@[Mod/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@blu@[Owner/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@blu@[Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@gre@[Mod/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@blu@[Owner/Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

}
